name: IslandNewsKITV4Weather
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the KITV4 Island News mobile app, you can get the latest news, weather, traffic, sports and more, directly from your mobile and tablet devices!

The easy-to-navigate interface allows you to surf throughout KITV.com with the touch of your finger, in the palm of your hand.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
